Room.Name: Spiral Staircase
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the clouds on a redwood staircase, winding around a huge tree.
Room.LongDescription: A rope ladder hangs down to a spiraling staircase below, which disappears in the clouds below you. Your's so high, it's hard to see anything on the ground below you. There's a message burned into the tree here. Looks like Trantori doesn't want any visitors. "Leave now, or become a toad for the rest of your life."
